entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MDT Friday 28 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MDT Friday 28 April 2023
